#####################
 MAIL CC AND TO TEXT
#####################

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png

.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png

|badge1| |badge2|

Add the CC and TO fields to the mail.mail model and fill these fields
automatically when receiving an email without res_partner model
dependency.

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

***************
 Configuration
***************

No configuration needed for this module.

*******
 Usage
*******

The mail.mail model contains the new CC and TO fields for the model
without res_partner model dependency.

************************
 Known issues / Roadmap
************************

There are no issues for the moment.

 Bug Tracker

reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a
